Interface IProjectController

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectController
public interface IProjectController
Interface for Project Controller in the BTO Management System. Defines methods to manage BTO projects.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      Project createProject(String projectName, String neighborhood, List<FlatType> flatTypes, List<Integer> numberOfUnits, List<Double> sellingPrices, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, HDBManager manager, int officerSlots)
      Creates a new project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project
      flatTypes - The types of flats available in the project
      numberOfUnits - The number of units for each flat type
      sellingPrices - The selling prices for each flat type
      openingDate - The application opening date
      closingDate - The application closing date
      manager - The manager in charge of the project
      officerSlots - The number of officer slots for the project
      Returns:
      The created project if successful, null otherwise

    • updateProject

      boolean updateProject(String projectId, String projectName, String neighborhood, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, int officerSlots, HDBManager manager)
      Updates an existing project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      projectName - The new name of the project
      neighborhood - The new neighborhood of the project
      openingDate - The new application opening date
      closingDate - The new application closing date
      officerSlots - The new number of officer slots
      manager - The manager updating the project
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteProject

      boolean deleteProject(String projectId, HDBManager manager)
      Deletes a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to delete
      manager - The manager deleting the project
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      boolean toggleProjectVisibility(String projectId, boolean visible, HDBManager manager)
      Toggles the visibility of a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to toggle visibility for
      visible - The new visibility status
      manager - The manager toggling the visibility
      Returns:
      true if the visibility was successfully toggled, false otherwise

    • registerOfficerForProject

      boolean registerOfficerForProject(String projectId, HDBOfficer officer)
      Registers an officer for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to register for
      officer - The officer to register
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful, false otherwise

    • getProjectById

      Project getProjectById(String projectId)
      Gets a project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to retrieve
      Returns:
      The requested project if found, null otherwise

    • getAllProjects

      List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Gets all projects.
      Returns:
      A list of all projects

    • getProjectsByManager

      List<Project> getProjectsByManager(HDBManager manager)
      Gets projects by manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager to get projects for
      Returns:
      A list of projects managed by the specified manager

    • getVisibleProjectsForApplicant

      List<Project> getVisibleProjectsForApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Gets projects visible to an applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant to get visible projects for
      Returns:
      A list of projects visible to the applicant

    • getApprovedOfficersForProject

      List<HDBOfficer> getApprovedOfficersForProject(String projectId)
      Gets all approved officers for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      A list of approved officers for the project

    • getRemainingOfficerSlots

      int getRemainingOfficerSlots(String projectId)
      Gets the count of remaining officer slots for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      The number of remaining officer slots
